title: Rock Star
description: Nick D is a gorgeous hunk who has survived a deprived and abusive childhood with the help of his guitar - his friend, lover, hope. He uses it to become a world renowned rock star. He has most things he ever wanted, but is still in search of his Dream Girl who he's dreamed about for years.Nick goes to Miami to play some concerts and to meet his father Mario, who he's never met, and his stepmother Dolores. Dolores hates Mario.Whilst in Miami Nick meets his Dream Girl, Andrea, and is happier than he has ever been. But will evil from his past destroy his future?
author: Lara Adams
